newsitem.title: UK: British foreign minister to visit Israel, UAE.
newsitem.headline: British foreign minister to visit Israel, UAE.

text.p: Britain's Foreign Secretary Malcolm Rifkind is to visit Israel, its occupied territories, the United Arab Emirates and Yemen next month.

Rifkind is to hold talks with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Foreign Minister David Levy to discuss the Middle East peace process. He is also due to meet Palestinian President Yasser Arafat in Gaza.
Rifkind is also due to meet ministers and other senior figures in the United Arab Emirates and Yemen.
Rifkind visited Israel and the occupied territories last year, but it will be his first visit as foreign secretary to Yemen and the United Arab Emirates, the foreign office said.
